message.body: Thx so much 4 the ryan updates. I've been really concerned. i'm glad u guys told janet. This is the worst case of anxiety i've ever seen.

It's like something is eating away at him. :( It's really sad. I started dreaming again last night and my second dream was Keith reading a letter of withdraw from Ryan's Dad because Ryan was too weak to do it himself. It's so sad Cara. I want to contact h
